settings.text: Experience the future of voice recording with our cutting-edge AI technology. Get instant, accurate transcriptions in 140 languages with intelligent summarization using 17 AI templates.
Experience the future of voice recording with our cutting-edge AI technology. Get instant, accurate transcriptions in 140 languages with intelligent summarization using 17 AI templates.
Never miss a moment with our ultra-long battery life and massive storage capacity. Record continuously for days without worrying about power or space.
Get started immediately with our comprehensive package. Every accessory is carefully selected to maximize your recording experience and convenience.
Includes unlimited cloud storage and a FREE magnetic case ($19.99 value)

Enjoy pure, uninterrupted recording
and transcription without any
advertisements or distractions.

Not satisfied? We offer worry-free
returns and exchanges with our
customer-first policy.
Includes unlimited cloud storage and a FREE magnetic case ($19.99 value)

settings.heading: How does the transcription service work after the first year?

settings.text: After your first year of free unlimited transcription, you'll receive 400 free transcription minutes every month starting from Year 2.

settings.heading: What are the pricing options if I exceed 400 minutes per month starting from Year 2?

settings.text:
If you exceed your 400 free monthly minutes from Year 2 onward, you can purchase affordable transcription minute packs(valid for 2 years):

120 minutes — $0.59

600 minutes — $2.59

3000 minutes — $10.99

6000 minutes — $19.99

settings.heading: How accurate is the AI transcription?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus achieves an accuracy rate of over 99% for transcription under optimal conditions. Accuracy may vary slightly depending on factors such as background noise, speaker clarity, and accents. Our advanced AI noise cancellation technology significantly enhances accuracy even in challenging environments such as cafés or busy offices.

settings.heading: What languages are supported for transcription and translation?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus supports transcription and translation in 140 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese (including Mandarin and Cantonese), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Hindi, and many more. The app is regularly updated to improve accuracy and add support for additional languages.

settings.heading: How long does the battery last?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus features a 400 mAh rechargeable battery providing up to 40 hours of continuous recording on a single charge. In standby mode, it lasts up to 60 days. The device charges fully in approximately 1.5 hours via the included USB charging cable.

settings.heading: What file formats does the recorder support?

settings.text: The UMEVO Note Plus supports standard audio formats such as MP3 and WAV. Transcribed text can be exported as TXT, DOCX, or PDF files for easy use across various devices and applications.

The UMEVO Note Plus achieves an accuracy rate of over 99% for transcription under optimal conditions. Accuracy may vary slightly depending on factors such as background noise, speaker clarity, and accents. Our advanced AI noise cancellation technology significantly enhances accuracy even in challenging environments such as cafés or busy offices.
What languages are supported for transcription and translation?

The UMEVO Note Plus supports transcription and translation in 140 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese (including Mandarin and Cantonese), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Hindi, and many more. The app is regularly updated to improve accuracy and add support for additional languages.

The UMEVO Note Plus features a 400 mAh rechargeable battery providing up to 40 hours of continuous recording on a single charge. In standby mode, it lasts up to 60 days. The device charges fully in approximately 1.5 hours via the included USB charging cable.
What file formats does the recorder support?
The UMEVO Note Plus supports standard audio formats such as MP3 and WAV. Transcribed text can be exported as TXT, DOCX, or PDF files for easy use across various devices and applications.
Is there a subscription fee for using the AI features?

Your purchase of the UMEVO Note Plus includes 400 minutes of AI transcription and summarization per month at no additional cost, sufficient for most users. Flexible subscription plans are available for high-volume users requiring additional transcription time. All other features, including recording, storage, and basic app functionality, remain free.
